creditline: The Kenneth and Elayne Hengler Endowment for Art Acquisition, the William Hood Dunwoody Fund, and gift of Anthony d'Offay
description: square four-sided structure with a deity seated beneath an archway on each side; pair of lions flanking a symbol beneath each deity; lions on bottom step at each corner; domes top with petal design; square finial with round concave area at center; bronze patina
title: Votive stupa
